content: I do not have personal preferences or experiences. however, the best time to visit huangshan national park is during spring (march-may) and fall (september-november) months when the weather is pleasant, and the scenery is beautiful. during these months, the temperature is mild, and the park is less crowded, allowing visitors to enjoy its stunning landscapes, unique rock formations, and stunning sunrise and sunset views. avoid visiting during summer as it can be hot and humid, and the park can be extremely crowded, and during winter when the weather can be harsh and the park can be closed due to ice and snow.
